description.narrative: The Myanmar Education Quality Improvement Program (My EQIP) aims to improve education policy, planning, budgeting, and management through development of inclusive systems for education quality improvement. My EQIP is a joint initiative between the Government of Myanmar, through the Ministry of Education (MoE), and the Australian Government, through the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT). The role of the Contractor is to support the Government of Myanmar to implement the Program effectively through the provision of support services and timely, high quality and relevant inputs, including specialist inputs on social inclusion. The Evaluation Capacity Building Specialist will provide a support and mentoring role, helping build selected staff capacity and fostering ownership of My-EQIP within MoE. The total value of this investment is $19,977,896.48 over 5 years, starting 2016-17.
